english.segment1: You paint the night. You count the stars and call them by name. the skies proclaim. God You reign. Your glory shines. You teach the sun when to bring a new day. creation sings God You reign
english.segment2: God You reign. God You reign. forever and ever. God You reign
english.segment3: You part the seas. You move the mountains with the words that you say. my song remains. God You reign. You hold my life. You know my heart and You call me by name. I live to say God You reign
